DESCRIPTION: Adds or removes a role to the `staff` command.
NO_STATUS: Please enter `add` to add or `remove` to remove a role.
ALREADY_ADDED: The role {{role}} is already added to the `staff` command.
SUCCESS_ADDED: Successfully added the role {{role}} to the `staff` command.
NOT_ADDED: The role {{role}} isn't added to the `staff` command.
SUCCESS_REMOVED: Successfully removed the role {{role}} from the `staff` command.
NO_NEW_ROLES_TO_ADD: There are no new roles with this name that can be added to the `staff` command.
NO_NEW_ROLES_TO_REMOVE: There are no more roles with this name to remove from the `staff` command
